resources.name: Mission United Tarrant County
resources.description: Mission United Tarrant County uses innovative technology to connect active military, veterans, and their families to services, resources, and programming. The network partners with Combined Arms, veteran service organizations, community-based organizations, and government programs to provide comprehensive support.
resources.eligibility: Veterans, active-duty service members, National Guard, Reservists, and their families in Tarrant County and surrounding areas.
resources.how_to_apply: Call 817-258-8082 or visit the website to connect with a Mission United navigator. You can also access resources through the Combined Arms network.
